data: Lucy Fountain | Edward Fountain | Mr. Bazalgette | Mrs. Fountain
a quarter of a century ago

NEARLY a quarter of a century ago, Lucy Fountain, a young lady of beauty and distinction, was, by the death of her mother, her sole surviving parent, left in the hands of her two trustees, Edward Fountain, Esq., of Font Abbey, and Mr. Bazalgette, a merchant whose wife was Mrs. Fountainâ€™s half-sister.
Love Me Little, Love Me Long
